Reviews.Title: Good Deal Gone Bad, but it was salvageable
Reviews.Author: sy
Reviews.Content: I ordered this laptop because of its legacy hardware ( serial ports, LPT ports, USB ports, and above all else, Windows xp pro)- the purchase / checkout offered 2nd day delivery, yet took over 1 week to arrive- After arriving, inspecting the laptop, it was carefully wrapped, no visible damage was present.After putting everything together, plugging in the power cord, i get an error message that no hard drive is present, i go into the bios, and to my amazement, its still locked with a password, that no one knows-i pulled the Hard drive module out, and inspect everything, i find that the mini IDE header is missing a pin- , i emailed the seller this issue, he sends out another hard drive- a week goes by, and it finally arrives, i opened the package, and notice, it does not have the replacement header that i need to make the hard drive work.Frustrated, i get back on amazon, and search for this header adaptor, lo and behold, for 1.72 each, i buy 5 just to have them around in case i decide to buy another hard drive from these sellers that do not check everything fully.If i had been an everyday normal  'joe-the-consumer', this would have been a disasterous exchange. i gave a low rating because, when you sell something, regardless what it looks like, it should be functional before you ship, (tested, and tried)

Reviews.Title: Good Solid Machine
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Krehbiel
Reviews.Content: I purchased my D810 with windows XP refurbished from Tampa Laptops.It is a good solid machine. The screen appears to be wider. It is a heavier machine. I notice it on those times when I need to carry it a ways. Not alot but more than some other computers. It has a very solid cabinet. Nice sized keyboard is easy to type on. Once in a while the keyboard gets warm. My battery on this used one is running around 3-1/2 hours on a charge which I consider fine. The battery of course varries on used machines due to it's condition. But this tells you that a good battery runs for a good length of time. I like the machine. I am runing lots of older vintage software like the great Lotus stuff, etc and wanted to upgrade computers but not throw out all my software that won't run on the newer Windows Systems. This was a great purchase at a nice price.

Reviews.Title: Dell d810
Reviews.Author: Jackie Dean Caraway "sgtch2"
Reviews.Content: Great item a little on the large size but sturdy and works great. Well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude D180 Windows xp
Reviews.Author: JJ1000
Reviews.Content: We received the laptop within a couple of days of ordering and my boyfriend uses this all of the time. The laptop works great, plays movies very well as we use netflix and Hulu with it and you can play games very well also. I liked the price and thought the product was worth the price. We have had it for a couple of months now and I am not technical, but there seems to be no problems other than when we got it, we had to get a new adapter for it as the one they supplied was not working, Other than that, everything was great!!!

Reviews.Title: First Lap Top Was A Success
Reviews.Author: journeyman
Reviews.Content: I really didn't know that operating a laptop would be so fun & easy.  Not to mention convenient; I can take it with me becauseit also runs off of a battery.  Its powerful; fast and really professional looking.  Great buy.Mark

Reviews.Title: great, thank you...
Reviews.Author: michelbayard
Reviews.Content: Thank you so much for the great service, everything worked as expected, it was exactly what i was looking for...

Reviews.Title: Great computer!
Reviews.Author: Wendy W.
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a birthday gift for my mother-in-law when her old laptop hard drive crashed. She loves it and says it is in great shape for a refurbished computer. She says everything works perfectly and that the speed is much faster than her old computer. Thanks so much - VERY HAPPY!

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT customer service!
Reviews.Author: Mary Allers-Korostynski
Reviews.Content: These guys went above and beyond on this purchase.  I had problems with the D810 (may have been operator error I don't know) but they sent a new one right away.  I needed help getting it set up and one of the guys helped me on a Saturday and had to go into the office to get me up and running!!  I couldn't believe it.  Their communication has been excellent and they are very concerned about having happy customers.  I love my laptop!!  It is refurbished and runs perfectly.  Wish I could give them more than 5 stars I am that happy with this transaction!!

Reviews.Title: Non Working System!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: KEVIN FERGUSON
Reviews.Content: non-working system....seller had his personal info/account info stored........not able to WiFi/connected to the internet.... very slow startup and operating system failure.......  also was shipped inappropriately (not packed correctly and was disgustedly filthy and dirty)

Reviews.Title: Glad I got this.
Reviews.Author: Loren Edwards "Ed"
Reviews.Content: Does everything it should.The bottem does get very hot after using it for a long time.The wireless wifi always works.

Reviews.Title: Good product and fast service
Reviews.Author: Ken Ace "Ken"
Reviews.Content: Bought that for my grandson too. And it has been working good without any problems, for a used computer it is doing him well

Reviews.Title: dont buy
Reviews.Author: WIZBIT
Reviews.Content: cant get on line with it and you cant the anyone to help you....they tell you it is a sold as is after you get it

Reviews.Title: ac adapter charger
Reviews.Author: Jose R.
Reviews.Content: computer was great but ac adapter that came with laptop shorted out in three weeks, just ordered a replacement, other than that ac adapter issue the laptop works great!

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude D810 Wireless Laptop Bluetooth PC
Reviews.Author: Bezo
Reviews.Content: Came with a copy of MSFT Windows 95 on a CD that has no product code, hence unusable as a backup.Otherwise the bulky and heavy machine works.[...]
